review_title: feel like driving a jet plane
review_text:
Indeed its a great truck, very spacious, stylish, great road grip and pick up, luxurious in its breed, among one of the best models of nissan,

I drove it off the road yesterday, it thrills, at the speed of 200 km/hr it gives u feeling as you are driving at the speed of 50 km/hr, side and rear cameras enhance its performance,

review_text:
Great driving, road grip and comfort. i like it, wish to have it. it is much better then any prado, honda. great interior and exterior.

fule consumption is also not bad. good for safty manners.....
